data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Gurdaspur, Punjab, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gurdaspur, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Gurdaspur, Punjab, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Gurdaspur, Punjab, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Gurdaspur.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Gurdaspur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jat Mandahar people.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Gurdaspur to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Gurdaspur.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Gurdaspur, Punjab, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

location.name: Gurdaspur
location.people_groups_list: Kamboh (Sikh traditions), Dhobi (Sikh traditions), Jat Chahil (Sikh traditions), Jat Sindhu (Sikh traditions), Jat Pannun
